post_message: On this day in 1973, tennis champion Billie Jean King defeated Bobby Riggs in the “Battle of the Sexes.” King went on to found the Women’s Tennis Association, the Women’s Sports Foundation, and Women’s Sports Magazine to support women athletes on and off the court.
